name: Gblanchard4.github.io
body:
# Gene Blanchard
/ComputerScience/NewOrleans  
## I was born and raised in New Orleans. I graduated from the University of New Orleans with a B.S. in Computer Science. My focus was on computer security and information assurance. Lately I have been working in the bioinformatics field, specifically with 16s communities.   

### Interests 
I enjoy hacking code on the Raspberry Pi and making computers interact in the physical world.  
I've built a smart kegerator to combine my love for beer and my passion for code!  
I enjoy kayaking and fishing (as well as kayak fishing!)  


###Contact
me [at] geneblanchard.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
